other_title: Compilation of Final Fantasy VII - Part Two - Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children
Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children Complete
ファイナルファンタジーＶＩＩ: アドベントチルドレン (Japanese)
plot: Two years after the end of Final Fantasy VII the world is starting to get back on its feet and is working towards a new future. However, there is a new threat from a new illness called Geo-stigma, and three men that seem to be seeking Jenova. Cloud and his friends from the orginal game must once again reunite to combat the new threat.
ending_theme: "Safe and Sound" by Kyosuke Himuro feat Gerard Way
insert_song: "Advent: One-Winged Angel (再臨：片翼の天使 ～Advent: One-Winged Angel～; Sairin: Katatsubasa no Tenshi ～Advent: One-Winged Angel～)" by G.Y.A
"Advent: One-Winged Angel - ACC Version (再臨：片翼の天使 ～Advent: One-Winged Angel～ - ACC Version; Sairin: Katatsubasa no Tenshi ～Advent: One-Winged Angel～ - ACC Version)" by G.Y.A
"Divinity (天来; Tenrai)" by Tokyo Philharmonic Chorus
"The Promised Land (約束の地～The Promised Land～; Yakusoku no Chi～The Promised Land～)" by G.Y.A
